DOC.criteria: Histological diagnosis high grade locally advance metastatic osteosarcoma Must one prior chemotherapy regimen advance disease At least 1 unidimensional measurable lesion compute tomography ( CT ) scan Have good performance status Adequate organ function Have serious concomitant systemic disorder ( example active Human Immunodeficiency Virus infection ) Have brain metastasis adequately treat Significant weight loss ( 20 % ) previous 6 week study entry Inability unwillingness take folic acid vitamin B12 supplementation corticosteroid Pregnant breastfeeding
